product_name: Nitecore CR6 Multicolor LED Flashlight - White/Red - 2014 Overstock
long_description: Switching effortlessly between a superbright 440-lumen white LED and a 120-lumen red LED, this pocket-size flashlight shines on campsites and dark trails while minimizing eye fatigue.
short_description: Switching effortlessly between a superbright 440-lumen white LED and a 120-lumen red LED, this pocket-size flashlight shines on campsites and dark trails while minimizing eye fatigue.
